alert.note: Alert for Northern Middlesex; Northern New London (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 14 at 4:49PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern New London and northern Middlesex Counties through 515 PM EDT... At 449 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over East Haddam, or near Chester, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Colchester, East Hampton, Salem, Chester, East Haddam, Haddam, Lebanon, Bozrah, Lake Pocotopaug--East Hampton, Franklin, Moodus and Millington. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
